response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $10,000 to you, but I am offering it to you today for $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a high-end item at a competitive price. I look forward to hearing your response and serving you with the best possible service.", "product_price": 9500}
